rooms.description: Scandinavian design with light finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, adhering to Vastu by placing entrance in the south-east direction.
Open dining space adjacent to living room. Minimalistic style with natural wood finish.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, large windows placed in the north direction for optimum light and positive energy as per Vastu.
Secondary bedroom incorporating Scandinavian aesthetics, floor-to-ceiling windows along the east wall to catch morning sunlight.
